craf.name: AdaptiveHelm
craf.add_attrs:
Combat Start: Gain different bonuses based on starting position.

Front Two Rows: 40 Armor and Magic Resist. Gain 1 Mana when struck by an attack.

Back Two Rows: 20 Ability Power. Gain 10 Mana every 3 seconds.

craf.name: ArcaneGauntlet
craf.add_attrs:
Abilities can critically strike.

If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10% Critical Strike Damage instead.

craf.name: Bloodthirster
craf.add_attrs:
Gain 20% Omnivamp.

Once per combat: at 40% Health, gain a 25% maximum Health Shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

Omnivamp: heal for some of damage dealt

craf.name: BlueSentinel
craf.add_attrs:
Max mana reduce by 10.

When the holder gets a takedown, they deal 8% more damage for 8 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: BrambleVest
craf.add_attrs:
Gain 5% max health.

Take 8% reduced damage from attacks. When struck by any attack, deal 100 magic damage to all adjacent enemies

Cooldown: 2 seconds

craf.name: Crownguard
craf.add_attrs:
Combat start: Gain a 30% max Health Shield for 8 seconds.
When the shield expires, gain 35 Ability Power.

craf.name: DragonsClaw
craf.add_attrs:
Gain 9% max health.

Every 2 seconds, heal 5% max Health.

craf.name: Evenshroud
craf.add_attrs:
30% Sunder enemies within 2 hexes. Gain 25 Armor and Magic Resist for the first 10 seconds of combat.

Sunder: Reduce Armor

craf.name: Fimbulwinter
craf.add_attrs: Once per combat: At 40% Health, gain a 25% max Health Shield that lasts 5 seconds and gain 20 Armor and 20 Magic Resist.

craf.name: GiantSlayer
craf.add_attrs: Deal 25% more damage to enemies with more than 1750 maximum Health.

craf.name: Guardbreaker
craf.add_attrs: After damaging a Shield, deal 25% more damage for 3 seconds.

craf.name: GuardianAngel
craf.add_attrs:
Once per combat: At 60% Health, briefly become untargetable and shed negative effects. Then, gain 15% bonus Attack Speed.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craf.name: GuinsoosRageblade
craf.add_attrs: Attacks grant 5% stacking Attack Speed.

craf.name: HandofJustice
craf.add_attrs:
Gain 2 effects:
* 15% Attack Damage and 15 Ability Power.
* 15% Omnivamp.

Each round, randomly double 1 of these effects.

Omnivamp: heal for some of damage dealt

craf.name: HextechGunblade
craf.add_attrs:
Gain 20% Omnivamp, which also heals the lowest percent Health ally

Omnivamp: heal for some of damage dealt

craf.name: InfinityEdge
craf.add_attrs:
Ability can critically strike.

If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain 10% Critical Strike Damage instead.

craf.name: IonicSpark
craf.add_attrs:
30% Shred enemies within 2 hexes. When enemies cast an Ability, deal magic damage equal to 160% of their maximum Mana.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

craf.name: IronWill
craf.add_attrs: Gain 10 Armor and 10 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting the holder.

craf.name: LastWhisper
craf.add_attrs:
Physical damage 30% Sunders the target for 3 seconds. This effect does not stack.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
Sunder: reduce Armor

craf.name: LordsEdge
craf.add_attrs: Deal 8% bonus damage.

craf.name: LudensEcho
craf.add_attrs: Combat start: Gain 30 Ability Power every 5 seconds.

craf.name: Morellonomicon
craf.add_attrs:
Attacks and Abilities deals 1% Burn and 33% Wound to enemies for 10 seconds.

[Unique - Only 1 Per Champion]
Burn: Deals a percent of the target's maximum Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

craf.name: NashorsTooth
craf.add_attrs: After casting an Ability, gain 40% Attack Speed for 5 seconds.

craf.name: Quicksilver
craf.add_attrs:
Combat start: Gain immunity to crowd control for 14 seconds. During this time, gain 4% Attack Speed every 2 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

craf.name: RabadonsDeathcap
craf.add_attrs: Deal 20% bonus damage.

craf.name: RedBuffItem
craf.add_attrs:
Deal 6% bonus damage.

Attacks and Abilities 1% Burn and 33% Wound enemies for 5 seconds.

Burn: Deals a percent of the target's maximum Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

craf.name: Redemption
craf.add_attrs: Heal allies within 1 hex for 15% of their missing Health every 5 seconds. They also take 10% less damage for 5 seconds (damage reduction does not stack).

craf.name: RunaansHurricane
craf.add_attrs: Attacks fire a bolt at a neaby enemy, dealing 55% Attack Damage as physical damage.

craf.name: SpearofShojin
craf.add_attrs: Attacks grant 5 bonus Mana.

craf.name: StatikkShiv
craf.add_attrs:
Every 3rd attack deal 35 magic damage and 30% Shreds 4 enemies for 5 seconds.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist

craf.name: SteadfastHeart
craf.add_attrs: Take 8% less damage. While above 50% Health, take 15% less damage, instead.

craf.name: SteraksGage
craf.add_attrs: Once per combat at 60% Health, gain  25% max Health and 35% Attack Damage.

craf.name: SunfireCape
craf.add_attrs:
Every 2 seconds, deal 1% Burn and 33% Wound to an enemy within 2 hexes for 10 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
Burn: Deals a percent of the target's maximum Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

craf.name: ThiefsGloves
craf.add_attrs:
Each round: Equip 2 random items.

[Consumes 3 item slots.]

craf.name: TitansResolve
craf.add_attrs:
Gain 2% Attack Damage and 1 Ability Power when attacking or taking damage, stacking up to 25 times.

At full stacks, gain 20 Armor and Magic Resist.

craf.add_attrs: Gain 8% max health.

Each round: Equip 2 random Ornn Artifacts.

arti.name: DeathfireGrasp
arti.add_attrs:
Combat start: Blast the current target for 20% of their max Health as magic damage.

For the next 10 seconds, deal 25% more damage. Damage dealt to the blasted target is increased to 35%.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

arti.name: DiamondHands
arti.add_attrs:
Once per combat: At 50% Health, become invulnerable for 1.5 seconds and grant 1 gold.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

arti.name: GamblersBlade
arti.add_attrs:
Grant 1% bonus Attack Speed per gold in your bank (up to 30 gold).

Each attack has a 4% chance to drop 1 gold.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

arti.name: Hullcrusher
arti.add_attrs: Combat start: If there are no adjacent allies, gain 600 Health.

arti.name: OrnnItemDeathsDance
arti.add_attrs:
Gain a 25% Omnivamp. 50% of the damage the holder receives is instead dealt over 4 seconds as non-lethal damage.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
Omnivamp: heal for some of damage dealt

arti.name: OrnnItemEverfrost
arti.add_attrs:
Enemies who damage the holder are 20% Chilled for 1.5 seconds. After 7 Chills from this them, the attacker is Stunned instead. (Cooldown: 15 seconds).

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
Chill: reduce Attack Speed
Stun: cannot move, attack, or cast Abilities

arti.name: OrnnItemMuramana
arti.add_attrs:
Once per combat: After casting an Ability, restore 120 mana over 5 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemSpiritVisage
arti.add_attrs: Heal 2.5% max health every second.

arti.name: OrnnItemTheCollector

Attacks and Abilities execute enemies below 12% of their max Health. Executions have a 40% chance to drop 1 gold .

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

arti.name: OrnnItemTrinityForce
arti.add_attrs: Health +250, Mana +25, Attack Damage +25%, Ability Power +25, Armor +25, Magic Resist +25, Attack Speed +25%

arti.name: OrnnItemZhonyasHourglass
arti.add_attrs:
Once per combat: At 40% Health, become invulnerable for 3 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

arti.name: SnipersFocus
arti.add_attrs: Gain +1 Attack range. Damage is increasedy by 9% for each hex between the holder and their target.

arti.name: TrickstersGlass
arti.add_attrs:
Summon a clone with 70% maximum Health and 30% increased max Mana. You cannot equip items to the clone.

The clone benefits from active traits.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

arti.name: SuspiciousTrenchCoat
arti.add_attrs:
Once per combat at 50% Health, the holder splits into three copies of themself each with 33% of their max Health.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

arti.name: TalismanOfAscension
arti.add_attrs: After 22 seconds gain 100% max Health and 120% increased damage for the rest of combat.

arti.name: CorruptVampiricScepter
arti.add_attrs:
Attacks deal an additional 60% Attack Damage as physical damage and heal the holder for the damage dealt.

The holder cannot cast their ability or gain mana.

arti.name: Fishbones
arti.add_attrs: Doubles the holder's attack range, and causes each of their attacks to target a random enemy.

arti.name: HorizonFocus
arti.add_attrs: Stunning an enemy causes lightning to strike them, dealing 30% of their max Health as magic damage.

arti.name: Mittens
arti.add_attrs:
Shrinks the holder, granting them increased movement speed, 20% damage reduction, and immunity to Chill.

Chill: reduce Attack Speed

arti.name: UnendingDespair
arti.add_attrs: Whenever a Shield on the holder breaks, 125% of that Shield's initial value is dealt to the nearest enemy as magic damage.

arti.name: RapidFirecannon
arti.add_attrs: Gain +1 Attack Range, increased by 1 whenever the holder kills an enemy.

arti.name: InnervatingLocket
arti.add_attrs:
The holder gains 2% of their total Mana whenever they're hit by an attack.

Each cast restores 20% of the holder's max Health over 3 seconds.

arti.name: LudensTempest
arti.add_attrs: 100% of overkill damage plus 100 is dealt as magic damage to the three enemies nearest the target.

arti.name: SilvermereDawn
arti.add_attrs:
Grants immunity to stuns and the holder's attacks stun the target for 0.8 seconds.

The holder's attack speed is locked at 0.5.

arti.name: ProwlersClaw
arti.add_attrs: After killing a target, shed negative effects and dash to the farthest target within 4 hexes. The next two critical attacks deal 60% bonus critical strike damage.

arti.name: SpectralCutlass
arti.add_attrs: Combat Start: Teleports the holder to the mirrored hex on the enemy's side of the board. After 8 seconds, the holder returns to their original location.

arti.name: BlightingJewel
arti.add_attrs: Dealing magic damage reduces the target's Magic Resist by 4. If their Magic Resist is 0, this grants the holder 5 Mana instead.

arti.name: WitsEnd
arti.add_attrs:
Attacks deal 42-100 bonus magic damage.

Heals the holder for 35% of all magic damage dealt.

Damage increases based on Stage

arti.name: ForbiddenIdol
arti.add_attrs: Shields have 50% of their value converted to max Health instead.

arti.name: LichBane
arti.add_attrs:
The holder's first attack after each ability cast deals 200-480 bonus magic damage.

Damage increases based on Stage

arti.name: LightshieldCrest
arti.add_attrs:
Every 3 seconds, Shields the lowest percent Health ally for 50% of the holder's combined Armor and Magic Resist.

On death grants this shield to all allies.

arti.name: SeekersArmguard
arti.add_attrs: Takedowns increase the holder's Armor, Magic Resist, and Ability Power by 10, increased to 15 if they score the kill.

supp.name: AegisoftheLegion
supp.add_attrs:
Combat start: Grant 25% Attack Speed and 15 Armor and Magic Resist to the holder, adjacent allies, and all allies behind them for 12 seconds.

​​[Support item]

supp.add_attrs:
Damage dealt 30% Shres and 30% Sunders enemies for 15 seconds.

​​Your team gains 8% Attack Damage and 8 Ability Power.

Sunder: reduce Armor

supp.name: OrnnItemRanduinsOmen
supp.add_attrs:
Combat start: Grant 30 Armor and 30 Magic Resistance to the holder and adjacent allies.

[Support item]

supp.name: Shroud
supp.add_attrs:
Combat Start: Shoot a beam that 30% Mana Reaves enemies.
Your team gains 60 Health.

[Support item] [Unique - only 1 per champion]
Mana Reave: increase maximum Mana until the next cast

supp.name: VirtueoftheMartyr
supp.add_attrs:
Every 5 seconds, heal your team for 7% of their max Health. When the holder dies, the healing increases to 14% max Health and for 2 additional heals.

​​[Support item]

supp.name: ZekesHerald
supp.add_attrs:
Combat start: Grant 30% Attack Speed to the holder and allies within 2 hexes in the same row.

[Support item]

supp.name: Zephyr
supp.add_attrs:
Combat start: Summon a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds.

Your team gains 8% Attack Speed.

​​[Support item]
[Ignores crowd control immunity.]
[Unique - only 1 per champion]

supp.name: ZzRotPortal
supp.add_attrs:
Combat start: Summon a large Voidspawn that forces nearby enemies to attack it.

​​[Support item]

supp.name: AccomplicesGloves
supp.add_attrs:
Each round: Equip 2 random Support items.

[Consumes 3 item slots.]

supp.name: TheEternalFlame
supp.add_attrs:
While the holder is alive, all enemies are 33% Wounded and all allies deal 8% more damage. This effect refreshes every 5 seconds.

​​[Support item]
Wound: Reduces healing received

supp.name: KnightsVow
supp.add_attrs:
Combat start: Grant 200 Health and 15% Omnivamp to the holder and allies within 1 hex in the same row.

​​[Support item]

supp.name: MoonstoneRenewer
supp.add_attrs:
Every 4 seconds, grant a 60-360 Shield (based on stage) to the 2 lowest percent health allies for 4 seconds.

​​[Support item]

supp.name: Spite
supp.add_attrs:
When this unit dies, reduce the Attack Damage and Ability Power of enemy units within 2-hexes by 25% for 15 seconds.

Allies within the explosion range gain 40% Attack Damage and Ability Power for the same duration.

​​[Support item]

supp.name: UnstableTreasureChest
supp.add_attrs:
When the holder dies, the 3 closest allies gain a temporary completed item.

​​[Support item]

trait_items.name: Tattoo of Bombardment
trait_items.desc: Every third attack fires bolts at the two lowest percent health enemies which deal 60% Attack Damage as physical damage.

trait_items.name: Tattoo of Force
trait_items.desc: Whenever the holder acquires a new target they run quickly to and briefly stun them, dealing 250 magic damage, and double the stats from this item for 4 seconds.

trait_items.name: Tattoo of Fury
trait_items.desc: Deal 35% bonus damage to targets below half health. On takedown, gain 40% attack speed for 6 seconds.

trait_items.name: Tattoo of Protection
trait_items.desc: Gain a 40% max Health Shield after casting the first time each combat. When it breaks, grant 40% of this shield amount to the two nearest allies.

trait_items.name: Tattoo of Toxin
trait_items.desc:
Damage applies a toxin that deals an additional 33% of that damage over 3 seconds and 33% Wounds the target.

Wound: Reduces healing received

trait_items.name: Tattoo of Vitality
trait_items.desc: Attacks heal the holder for 3% of their max Health and deal the same amount as bonus magic damage.

trait_items.name: Scroll of Force
trait_items.desc: Kayle's ability hits a wider area

trait_items.name: Talisman of Aid
trait_items.desc: Kayle's damaging attacks and abilities 20% Shred and Sunder enemies hit for 3 seconds.

trait_items.name: Talisman of Speed
trait_items.desc: Grant Kayle and adjacent allies in the same row 12% Attack Speed at the start of combat.

trait_items.name: Scroll of Haste
trait_items.desc: Attack grant Kayle 6% stacking Attack Speed

trait_items.name: Tome of Swiftness
trait_items.desc: Kayle deals 20% more damage. Her attacks now hit in a 1-hex radius around the target

trait_items.name: Tome of Mending
trait_items.desc: Every 7 seconds, revive the strongest ally that hasn't been revived yet at 50% Health.

trait_items.name: Talisman of Might
trait_items.desc: Grant Kayle and adjacent allies in the same row 20 Ability Power at the start of combat.

trait_items.name: Tome of Power
trait_items.desc: Deal 15% more damage. When Kayle casts, she fires two waves.
